pkgmetadata.longdescription: Complexity of Short and Coarse-Grained Time Series // While there are many well-established measures for identifying critical fluctuations and phase transitions, these measures only work with many points of measurement and thus are unreliable when studying short and coarse-grained time series. This package provides a measure for complexity in a time series that does not rely on long time series (Kaiser (2017), doi:10.17605/OSF.IO/GWTKX).
